channel.title: 508 server help
channel.description: im making a new server i have a problem when connecting to my server what do i do when the client connects for the update part of loading what do i have to send to the client to make it continue loading or do i have to disconnect it or somthing

item.title: 508 server help

item.description:

no i can connect to my server but when im connecting
in the loading part of the client what do i have to do to make it continut is there a surtin
number or somthing i have to send to it?

Read full topic

item.title: 508 server help
item.dc:creator: @lildude783 lildude783
item.description:
@lildude783 wrote:

u have to make sure ur server is online when u run the client… and u should probably get an IP changer… just to make sure it’ll ALWAYS connect to the server u wanna use…

GET THE Umairscape 508 Client IP changer… then use that 508 Client once ur server is online and running

Read full topic
